pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Sleep 100 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Sleep is a premium quality formula containing magnesium and herbs, including valerian, to help calm the mind, relieve nervous tension and reduce sleeplessness. Sleep Support: Valerian is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine for its sedative properties to help minimise sleep challenges. Nervous Tension: Valerian is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to help relieve tenseness, restlessness, irritability and encourage restful sleep. Sleep is required to restore the body and mind. Swisse Ultiboost Sleep has been formulated based on traditional evidence to provide key ingredients beneficial to sleep in a convenient dose.

Size: 100 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

MAGNESIUM (from magnesium orotate 100 mg) 6.4 mg

STANDARDISED EXTRACTS EQUIVALENT TO DRY:

VALERIAN (Valeriana officinalis) root (equiv. valerenic acids 2.6 mg) 1.3 g

LICORICE (Glycyrrhiza glabra) root & stolon (equiv. glycyrrhizinic acid 2.5 mg) 50 mg

EXTRACTS EQUIVALENT TO DRY:

HOPS (Humulus lupulus) flower 200 mg

CHINA ROOT (Poria cocos) fruiting body 50 mg

ANEMARRHENA ASPHODELOIDES root 50 mg

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

One-two tablets, half to one hour before sleeping, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
